it.unibz.pomodroid.persistency
Class Activity

java.lang.Object
  it.unibz.pomodroid.models.Activity
      it.unibz.pomodroid.persistency.Activity

public class Activity
extends Activity

A class representing an extension of the activity class. Whit the help of the open source object database db40 the activity is saved into a local database.

Author:
Daniel Graziotin 4801 , Thomas Schievenin 5701
